medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient was referred for evaluation of a 7-year history of depression, social withdrawal, and memory loss.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 7 years prior to evaluation, with cognitive and motoric slowing forcing early retirement 2 years ago. The patient noted increased daytime sleepiness, occasional delayed sleep onset, irritability, and easy crying.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of depression, social withdrawal, and cognitive slowing for 7 years; treated unsuccessfully for depression with various medications.
medical_history.family_history: Similar intracranial calcifications noted in the patient's 14-year-old daughter.
